entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 9:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning late this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Rain along the coast. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain along the coast early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Showers beginning in the evening then changing to 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
